content: Haibo Wang Home About me Publications Group Services Haibo Wang Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science University of Kentucky Office: 301 Davis Marksbury Building E-mail: wanghaibo at uky dot edu Links: CV, Google Scholar Short Bio Haibo Wang is a tenure-track assistant professor with Department of Computer Science at the University of Kentucky. He received his Ph.D. in computer science from the University of Florida in May 2023, advised by Shigang Chen. Prior to that, he received his B.E. degree in 2016 and Masterâs degree in computer science in 2019, both from the University of Science and Technology of China, advised by Liusheng Huang and Hongli Xu. His main research interests are network traffic measurement, data sketches and streaming algorithms, Internet of Things and network systems. His work received IEEE ICNP 2021 best paper award.
